mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.issue_id AS "issueId", a.lockpasscnt AS "lockpasscnt", a.scholarship_amount AS "scholarshipAmount", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.modifiedtime AS "modifiedtime", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_issue( id, user_id, issue_id, lockpasscnt, scholarship_amount, createtime, modifiedtime ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{issueId}, #{lockpasscnt}, #{scholarshipAmount}, #{createtime}, #{modifiedtime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_issue SET user_id = #{user.id}, issue_id = #{issueId}, lockpasscnt = #{lockpasscnt}, scholarship_amount = #{scholarshipAmount}, createtime = #{createtime}, modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime} WHERE id = #{id}
